snippet: Most of the world’s top players descended on Europe to compete in either the Candidates tournament or the European Individual Chess Championship.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that world's top players have descended on Europe to compete in either the Candidates tournament or the European Individual Chess Championship, two competitions that have the potential to shake up the world chess order.
lead_paragraph: Most of the world’s top players descended on Europe to compete in either the Candidates tournament or the European Individual Chess Championship.

headline.main: Two European Events Could Scramble Rankings
headline.print_headline: Two European Events Could Scramble Rankings
